ApplicationRenderMethod.name: ApplicationRenderMethod
ApplicationRenderMethod.description: Represents how a part of an application can be rendered.

Description.description: The description of the application render method.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

MethodName.description: The name of the render method associated with the application.

MethodRecordId.description: The record ID of the method that's associated with the application render method.

MethodType.description: Specifies the type of method that's used to render components in the application.

Name.description: The name of the application render method.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns the record.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the application render method.
